entry.title: New release for Fedify: Fedify 1.7.4
entry.content:
Released on July 13, 2025.

  • Fixed a bug the -T/--no-tunnel option in the fedify inbox command was being ignored, causing the server to always create a public tunnel regardless of the flag. [#243, #284 by Lee ByeongJun]

entry.title: New release for Fedify: Fedify 1.6.6
entry.content:
Released on July 15, 2025.

  • Fixed TypeError: unusable error that occurred when doubleKnock() encountered redirects during HTTP signature retry attempts. [#294, #295]

entry.title: New release for Fedify: Fedify 1.6.7
entry.content:
Released on July 24, 2025.

  • Fixed doubleKnock() to properly handle redirects with path-only Location headers by resolving them relative to the original request URL. [#324 by Fabien O'Carroll]
